EmailServiceConfiguration

SMTP settings used by the email service.

Columns

  • c_email_configuration_id (PK)
  • vc_smtp_host
  • i_smtp_port
  • vc_user_name

Typical Usage

Holds SMTP credentials and default sender information for outbound email.
